ComicInfo.Title: Where Darkness Dwells, Dwell I!
ComicInfo.Summary: Hercules and Thor try to solve the mystery of the "spontaneous insanity" afflicting New York. But Herc's hunting for answers lands him in deep trouble!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 10:54:31. [CVDB14777] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:19:51. [Issue ID 27952]
ComicInfo.Characters: Odin,Moe Hartwell (Introduction)(Death),Krista,Hercules,Thor,Detective Sergeant Ralph Blumkenn (Introduction),Fear (he who walks in darkness) (Introduction),Sif,Theresa Mendell (Introduction)(Death)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
